hypothesis_content.title: Miner Capitulation Contrarian Reversal
hypothesis_content.statement: When Bitcoin miner capitulation reaches extreme levels (as indicated by a 7-day average hash rate decline >10% from 30-day high AND mining difficulty adjustment turns negative), a contrarian long position in BTC will yield positive alpha within 14 days, as selling pressure from distressed miners is exhausted and the market overreacts to the negative news.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Miner capitulation represents forced selling from a core constituency. When this selling is exhausted, it often marks local bottoms as the most distressed sellers are flushed out. The market tends to overreact to negative miner news, creating buying opportunities.
entry_conditions: BTC 7-day avg hash rate declines >10% from 30-day high
Most recent Bitcoin difficulty adjustment is negative
BTC price is below its 20-day moving average

exit_conditions.take_profit: 15% gain from entry OR BTC price crosses above 50-day MA

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If BTC continues to decline >15% after miner capitulation signals without meaningful reversal within 14 days, or if hash rate continues declining for >21 days post-signal.
